email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate we’re quoting is in the low 50s ($50.50 per metric ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were expecting. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the laycan dates? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concern about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $48.75 per metric ton, which is a competitive rate for this route. As for the laycan, we’re looking at October 20-25 for loading. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.75 sounds more reasonable. We can proceed with that rate. However, we’d need the laycan to be tightened to October 22-24 to align with our schedule. Also, could you confirm the demurrage terms? Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, glad to hear the rate works for you. We can adjust the laycan to October 22-24 as requested. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if you need the charter party drafted, and we can finalize the details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Please go ahead and draft the charter party. We’ll review and confirm shortly. Thanks for your assistance throughout this process. Cheers, John
